root.name: BattleTanx: Global Assault
root.description: In BattleTanx: Global Assault, players assume the role of a Griffin Spade, who has his army mind-controlled and turned against him by a Queenlord named Cassandra - who has kidnapped Griffin's son. You travel across the United States and on to Europe in fully destructable environments trying to catch Cassandra and build a new army. The selection of tanks and gangs available in both the campaign and multiplayer has increased as well as the number of powerups.
